name: iTraxViewer
short_description:
The project is presented as a tool for the radiologist’s workstation which, from fMRI studies, supports the diagnostic of brain pathologies by a 3D fiber model of the brain's white matter. Compared to other applications, this tool is offered free of charge and is developed with the today technologies of modeling and rendering 3D.
The performance characteristics and functionality will be based on high costs commercially available and limited academic use applications. This will result in rendering three-dimensional models and navigation techniques with an efficient information processing.
Finally, the project looks to improve the quality of service in the health area through the development of diagnostic technologies and make a contribution of initiative to the research and software development in the medical informatics area of our country.
summary: Software tool for visualization of brain fibers in 3D
